pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sparse Group Partial Least Square Methods // Regularized version of partial least square approaches providing sparse, group, and sparse group versions of partial least square regression models (Liquet, B., Lafaye de Micheaux, P., Hejblum B., Thiebaut, R. (2016) doi:10.1093/bioinformatics/btv535). Version of PLS Discriminant analysis is also provided.
